databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_USER.MS_USER_ID , MS_USER.USER_KBN , MS_USER.LOGIN_ID , MS_USER.PASSWORD , MS_USER.MAIL_ADDRESS , MS_USER.SEI, MS_USER.MEI, MS_USER.SEI_KANA, MS_USER.MEI_KANA, MS_USER.SEX, MS_USER.ADMIN_FLAG , MS_USER.DELETE_FLAG , MS_USER.SEND_FLAG , MS_USER.VESSEL_ID , MS_USER.DATA_NO , MS_USER.USER_KEY , MS_USER.RENEW_DATE , MS_USER.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_USER.TS
from MS_USER inner join MS_SHINSEI_TANTOU ON MS_SHINSEI_TANTOU.MS_USER_ID = MS_USER.MS_USER_ID inner join MS_USER_BUMON ON MS_USER_BUMON.MS_BUMON_ID = MS_SHINSEI_TANTOU.MS_BUMON_ID and MS_USER_BUMON.MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID
where (MS_USER.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_USER.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)
